title: Schedule an Appointment — Balance Acupuncture
description: Schedule or cancel an appointment at Balance Acupuncture
cleaned_text: If you are a new patient, please visit our [Services Page](/services). On the bottom of that page there are FAQs that are likely to answer many of the questions you have about your first appointment. If you need to cancel an appointment, please fill out the form below. Cancel an appointment Charm EHR (our scheduling progam) does not allow you to cancel appointments directly. Please feel out this form to cancel an appointment, be sure to include the date and time of the appointment you want to cancel.
